resources.string: Please turn on the Permission of lock screen, If you want to remove this App, you should go to 【Settings】→【Security】→【Device administrators】and cancel permission first.

Only one function that is Turn Off and Lock Screen in this App, if you don\'t like press power key, maybe you like it. If you want to remove this App, you should go to 【Settings】→【Security】→【Device administrators】and cancel permission first.
Remove permission of Device administrators succeed, You can remove this App Now.

Single click floating button could lock screen,

Double click floating button could hide floating button temporarily,

You can restart floating button in the notification bar.
Xiaomi mobile user please turn on 【Show popup windows】and【Custom notification】
Click here to display floating button
Donate Version could enable all features
Return to home after lock screen
If enable this function, mobile will show up home screen
Your support can help me to develop more apps,\nSupport this app, all features are enabled.\nIf you had supported, please click here and upgrade to all features version.
Retrieve transaction data failed, Please try later!
Donate Version could enable all features,\nfor example Autostart floating button at reboot, restart floating button in the notification bar etc...
Donate Version could show floating button directly
